text: The Drummer's Fate () is a 1955 Soviet drama movie directed by Viktor Eisymont.Детское киноСУДЬБА БАРАБАНЩИКА (1955) It stars Daniil Sagal, Sergei Yasinsky, and Alla Larionova. == Actors == * Daniil Sagal as Batashov * Sergei Yasinsky as Sergei Batashov * Alla Larionova as Valentina * Andrei Abrikosov as Polovtsev * Viktor Khokhryakov as uncle Vasya * Klavdia Polovikova as old women * Aleksandr Lebedev as Yurka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1955 drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Movies directed by Viktor Eisymont
title: The Drummer's Fate
